title: Vegan-friendly restaurants in DC
name: Vegan-friendly restaurants in DC
description:
A Map by Moonwatcher

This is a map of vegan-friendly restaurants in the DC metro area. Most restaurants have at least one or two dishes that are vegan or can be made vegan, but these are restaurants that are particularly good for vegans. Either they are entirely vegan/vegetarian, or they feature vegan dishes. So far I have only listed places that I have personally eaten at, so it is definitely not an exhaustive list. You may notice it is a little biased toward my usual haunts of NW and Montgomery County. So if you have a favorite vegan-friendly place that I haven't listed, go ahead and add it.

Special thanks to VegDC.com for the addresses.

properties.name: Amma's Vegetarian Kitchen
properties.description: Posted by Happycow3291a M Street NW, Washington, District Of Columbia, United States, North America100% VegetarianRestaurantReviews

properties.description: Posted by Moonwatcher  2425 18th St NW, washington, dc

properties.name: Asylum
properties.description: Posted by Moonwatcher  2471 18th St NW, washington, dcMenu includes several vegan dishes with a vegan brunch menu on weekends.

properties.name: Charlie Chiang's
properties.description: Posted by Moonwatcher  4250 Connecticut Ave., N.W., Washington, dcThis Chinese restaurant offers vegetable dishes, tofu dishes, and several faux-meat dishes. Be sure to request the separate vegetarian menu; there\'s a vegetables section on the regular menu, but it doesn\'t include all the vegetarian dishes they offer.

properties.name: City Lights of China
properties.description: Posted by System1731 Connecticut Ave Nw, Washington, DCCity Lights of China (202) 265-6688

properties.name: Harmony Cafe
properties.description: Posted by Moonwatcher   3287 M St NW Washington, D.C.All of the meat dishes at this Asian restaurant can be made vegan upon request by using faux-meat, and there are also some delicious tofu dishes and veggie appetizers. The prices are very good.

properties.name: Java Green
properties.description: Posted by Moonwatcher  1020 19th Street nw, washington, dcAll-vegetarian, mostly-vegan cafe, featuring vegetarian & vegan sandwiches and tofu & faux-meat dishes.

properties.name: Mark's Kitchen
properties.description: Posted by Moonwatcher  7006 Carroll Avenue, Takoma Park, MarylandAmerican and Asian menu with many vegetarian and vegan options, including vegan breakfast items.

properties.description: Posted by Moonwatcher  1414 9th St NW, Washington, DCAll-vegetarian with many vegan choices (marked on menu). The food is excellent if a bit pricey. Brunch on Sundays from 11-3, including veggie sausage and tofu scrambles.
